question: What do you need to get started?
answer: 1. Business name 2. Tagline text (Optional) 3. Preferred color 4. Inspiration logo samples 5. Brand guideline

question: What is the Social Media Kit?
answer: The Social Media Kit includes cover photos/banners with your logo on a single color background that will fit into all major social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.

question: What are Source Files, Victor File and how are they helpful?
answer: Source files are the original editable files of the logo design by which you can edit/resize the logo to any size without losing quality using Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop software. They are available in Ai, EPS, PSD, PDF, PNG, JPG, and SVG formats.

question: What is a revision?
answer: A revision is a modification of the submitted design and refers to the font, color, the arrangement of elements etc. The revision does not mean a brand new design.

question: Looking for CHARACTER DESIGN?
answer: Please inbox me for details if you are looking for a Character Design.

question: How many logos will I get?
answer: In any package, there is only one final logo and its files at the end. The number of concepts offered in any package only highlights the number of initial drafts that will be shared, based on the brief and references received.

question: What is 3d mockup?
answer: 3D mock up is a 3D RENDERED mock up presentable image used for getting a realistic print view of the logo design.

question: How Premium Package is Beneficial?
answer: We will design 3 TOP NOTCH Quality logo variations + Source & Vector files. It will also include Social Media Design, symmetrical to a finalized logo which will brand your business excellently along with TOP Priority Support.

question: I have an idea in my mind, can you design based on that?
answer: Of course! Just make sure to order the appropriate package and hit me a message with all the details of your idea.

question: Do you provide any other graphical services?
answer: I do provide Label Design, Brand Style Guide Design, Instagram Posts Design, and much more. Please feel free to inquire more :).

question: What information do you need from us to start the work?
answer: The requirements for the project include: * A domain name. * A web hosting account to host the website. * Content for each page on the website. * Logo files or color preferences for the brand if any. (optional) * Any images that you want to see on the website if you have some already. (optional)

question: Will my website have a backup?
answer: I'll set an auto backup system for you so that it is recoverable in case anything goes wrong

question: Will my website be SEO friendly?
answer: Yes, I create your website using the best on-page SEO practices.

question: I'll show you a website that I like, can you create one similar to that?
answer: Yes I can create a custom website similar to your sample website. Please contact me so we can further discuss your ideas.

question: Do you offer unlimited revisions?
answer: No, unlimited revisions are not offered on my gig but unlimited revisions are never required on any orders because of the process that I follow. Once the first draft is created the buyer then gets to share a list of changes that they would want to see and then proceed accordingly.

question: Do you also design the graphics to be used on the website?
answer: This is a WordPress gig and not a Graphic design gig so all the graphics to be used on the website will either have to be provided by the buyer or will have to charge separately for, whichever the buyer sees fit.

question: Do you also create content for my website?
answer: This is not a content creation gig so the content to be added on the website needs to be provided beforehand and the gig does not include any content creation. If you don't have content ready for your website, please feel free to get in touch beforehand so we can engage a content writer separately.

question: Will i be able to manage my website later myself? or I am a beginner and I don't know anything about programming or coding.
answer: Of course! This is one of the reasons that makes every penny worth of the amount you spend on my services. I will provide you very helpful material that will make your life easier so you won't have to hire anyone every time to do basic tasks on your website.

question: Do you have any portfolio of your recent work?
answer: Yes, I do have portfolio. If your are interested in seeing some of my recent work then go ahead and contact me :) .

question: Do you provide License for the wordpress theme or plugins you use?
answer: No, I can use premium plugins or themes that i have purchased but if you want to get regular updates directly from their developers then you will have to get your own license.

question: What do you need to get started?
answer: 1. Business name 2. Tagline text (Optional) 3. Preferred color 4. Inspiration logo samples 5. Brand guideline

question: Is your work original?
answer: Everything we do is built from scratch, and is unique to your brand. We are a team of industry practitioners and design experts across a wide range of disciplines. We take great pride in everything that we do and the items we design for our clients.

question: Turnaround Time: How long does it typically take for edits to be completed?
answer: The turnaround time for any edit round ranges from 24 to 72 hours, depending on the complexity. For any new approach, the time frame extends to around 5 business days to ensure thorough consideration and execution.

question: What do you need to get started ?
answer: So I need all raw footage and some information on how you would like it edited. Therefore please contact me to discuss on your project

question: Which type video do you edit?
answer: We provide religion based and related video editing

question: Where I can see your work samples
answer: You can check all our samples on our gallery

question: Will shoot the footage for me?
answer: No, sorry we provide editing, so We will need you to provide us the raw footage for the video edit

question: Can you make a 60 second video for social media?
answer: Absolutely! If you send me the link to your Facebook, YouTube, or even send me the video file, I can edit it down to a single quote and make it polished.

question: Can you use my own music?
answer: Yes of course. Please send the audio and we'll use it for the video. We just need to know the start-end time if your audio is longer than the video

question: What file format will be animated logo be delivered in?
answer: The finished video will be in .MP4 or MOV format. Suitable for uploading to YouTube or Vimeo. Use on websites, presentations and it'll work with any device. If you need any other file formats please send a message with the order.

question: Can you change the intro colors?
answer: Can I? yes - I can change colors for your logo colors
